data.name: Archibolt, the Revolutionary
data.notes: "Archibolt, the Revolutionary" will appear during rainy weather on the small island in the south east of Biahno Lake which is to the west of NLA in Primordia. To quickly change the weather simply Fast Travel on the gamepad to refresh the area which causes the game to pick a new weather at random. The Return to Skell menu option works just the same.
